snippet.title: Shadows of Adam [Nintendo Switch] Teaser Trailer!
snippet.description:
A blend of classic ideas, modern touches, humour and outrageous battles, Shadows of Adam is both a love letter to classics in the genre and a fresh take! This Nintendo Switch release is also a complete edition, including the previous DLC 'Guild of the Artificers’.

Pre-orders on the Nintendo Switch eShop open on 26th April with a 10% discount, with the game launching on 3rd May!

Stay tuned to our Twitter accounts, @CIRCLE_Ent and @SomethingClassc, for more information!
